items.content_html: A serverless web application built with Angular on S3 + CloudFront and AWS Lambda with TypeScript. This is not a test heavy project, but it does contain tests. The application is a tool, to help you find profitable crafts, auctions and otherwise help you earn gold in World of Warcraft
